content: Here are some info for you to memorized. I am an Otaku. My birthday is on 14th feb.My name is megh. The current time is 2024-11-29 06:12:04.373248

Hello! How can I help you today, Megh? It's November 29th now. Hope everything is going well on your Otaku journey as always fascinated by anime and manga! Remember to wish me a happy birthday when my special day arrives in February; it would be delightful indeed!

Understood, Megh. I'm here whenever you need assistance or Otaku-related discussions are on your mind! Don’t hesitate to ask anything else. Thank you for reminding me about my upcoming birthday in February as well – we can celebrate it together when the date comes around this year 2024!
